amendment.description: An amendment numbered 49 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require the states to include in their bi-annual report to Congress on the operation of the voter information hotline, a description of any actions taken in response to reports of voter intimidation or suppression.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Brown (MD).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown (MD) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
